_source.text: 6) The Super Bowl Ratings were the greatest of all time, as expected, and with the Pro Bowl scoring higher than it has in a long time, the NFL is looking better than ever.

text: 6) The **Super** **Bowl** Ratings were the greatest of all time, as expected, and with the **Pro** **Bowl** scoring higher than it has in a long time, the NFL is looking **better** **than** ever.
